name: Nihilist
overview: Nihilist is 2D top-down shooter. Action takes place in seven-level complex patrolled by droids of eight different ranks: Alpha, Beta, Gamma, Delta, Epsilon, Lambda, Pi and Omega. The player starts as an Alpha-droid, the lowest. This droid hunts for others - he advances his status through the other ranks. Droid moves on level, searches weapon, enemies to kill and special places to recharge energy. Droid can use teleports.
